title: Game mode???
body: Where is the rotating game mode, its way over 11 am and now its over 3v3's  3 pm time. Are we still going to get or is it not in this client anymore??

replies.body: are you in new client? I can't find it either... its there in the old client though

> [{quoted}](name=Vita,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4uzXEAB3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-11T06:16:28.161+0000)
>
> are you in new client? I can't find it either... its there in the old client though

It is on the old client, but i don't want to go back to that i want full experience on this client so far i don't mind it though there are couple things that need to be fixed but its just released so no rush. But on the legacy client yes it is on that
Well, RGM isn't on the LCU yet so you're just going to have to deal with it.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4uzXEAB3,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-11T07:29:45.692+0000)
>
> Well, RGM isn't on the LCU yet so you're just going to have to deal with it.

Clearly, I'm not complaining I'm just asking when is it coming, Why do you have to be so negative??
